statements: UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET accuracy = 0.85, precision = 0.78, recall = 0.65 WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET precision = 0.82, accuracy = 0.88, timestamp = '2021-09-20 10:30:00' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET accuracy = 0.85, timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE model_name = 'Model A';
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET recall = 0.75, precision = 0.78, accuracy = 0.82, timestamp = '2022-02-01 09:45:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET metric_value = 0.75 WHERE model_id = 100 AND metric_name = 'Accuracy';
UPDATE model_metadata SET model_name = 'Updated Model' WHERE model_id = 50;
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET metric_value = 0.75 WHERE model_id = 123 AND metric_name = 'accuracy';
UPDATE models SET model_owner = 'John Doe' WHERE model_id = 456;
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET metric_value = 0.85 WHERE model_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE model_history SET metric_value = 0.9, updated_by = 'John Doe' WHERE model_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2022-03-01'
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET accuracy = 0.85, precision = 0.78 WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
UPDATE training_data SET feature_1 = 'updated_value', feature_2 = 'new_value' WHERE model_id = 'c8d24b2f-01e3-4adf-9885-8050de30b8e3';
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET accuracy = 0.85, recall = 0.75 WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest Model';
UPDATE training_data SET feature_1 = 'new_value1', feature_3 = 'updated_value3' WHERE model_id = (SELECT id FROM model_performance_metrics WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression Model');
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET metric_name = 'accuracy', metric_value = 0.85 WHERE model_id = 101
UPDATE model_training_log SET validation_loss = 0.125, epoch_number = 5 WHERE model_id = 201
UPDATE model_performance_metrics SET metric_value = 0.95 WHERE model_id = 101 AND metric_name = 'accuracy';
